# Classification

***

This document describes the process of implementing text regression in R with `quanteda`

## NText regression in R

#### Training

```{r}

library(quanteda)

myinaug <- inaugCorpus

# dependent variable is years since declaration of independence
year <- as.numeric((docvars(inaugCorpus)$Year)) - 1789

# independent variable is word tfidf
wordtfidf <- tfidf(trimdfm(dfm(inaugCorpus, stopwords=TRUE, stem=TRUE), minCount=8, minDoc=4))
wordtfidf <- sort(wordtfidf)[,0:400]
library(glmnet)
model <- glmnet(wordtfidf, year)
predict(model, newx=t(wordtfidf[3,]))

#dat <- as.data.frame(cbind(year, wordtfidf))
#model <- glm(year ~ wordtfidf, data=dat)

```
